dict.acceptation: 做（ do的过去式）；干；学习；研究；

sent.trans: （或They themselves did it。）这是他们亲自干的。

sent.orig: Although she did not reciprocate his feelings, she did not discourage him.
sent.trans: 尽管她没有回应他的感情，她也没有使他丧失信心。

sent.orig: Did he divorce his wife or did she divorce him?
sent.trans: 是他要和妻子离婚，还是妻子要和他离婚？

sent.orig: Did you design this, or did it just happen itself?
sent.trans: 这件事是你有意图安排的还是它自行发生的？

sent.orig: He did more than the rest of us did together.
sent.trans: 他做的比我们其余人合在一起做的还要多。
